message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I think a price of $11,500 is a fair offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for the best deal. While I can't go as low as $10,000, I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  I'm confident you won't find this value elsewhere.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. However, I still feel that $10,000 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can agree on this.
